name: Local SEO Setup
shortDescription: Get found by local customers searching for your services online.
heroDescription: Help local customers find your business when they search online. We set up your on-site SEO foundations, Google Business Profile, and local citations to boost your visibility.

deliverables.title: On-Site SEO
deliverables.description: Optimized titles, meta descriptions, and content structure

deliverables.title: Google Business Profile
deliverables.description: Setup and optimization of your GBP listing

deliverables.title: Schema Markup
deliverables.description: LocalBusiness and Service schema for rich results

deliverables.title: Location Pages
deliverables.description: Dedicated pages for each service area

deliverables.title: Internal Linking
deliverables.description: Strategic links to boost page authority

whoItsFor: Local service businesses (plumbers, dentists, lawyers, etc.)
Businesses wanting more calls and leads from Google
New businesses establishing their online presence

process.title: Audit
process.description: We analyze your current local search presence

process.title: Strategy
process.description: We create a plan based on your target areas

process.title: Implementation
process.description: We optimize your site and set up profiles

process.title: Handoff
process.description: We provide guidance on maintaining rankings

seo.title: Local SEO Setup Services
seo.description: Help local customers find your business online. Professional local SEO setup including on-site optimization, Google Business Profile, and local citations.
